projectGridLines.stationName: Ergon Technologies - Non Tech, Kochi, Ernakulam
projectGridLines.title: Title: Associate product manager role
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Associate product manager role


Description: Developing wireframes, userflows, PRDs for above projects and drawing analytical

insights from data in the product

Skill sets: Figma/Photoshop/AdobeXD, write SQL queries(must have), Advanced Excel;

Traits expectation: Good with designing, documentation, project management and data

Expected learning: Hands-on experience on designing and developing webapps with guiding

principles and standard practices

Specific courses required for project execution: Willingness and desire to enter product

management domain
